modShortDescription: The default headshot damage makes it difficult to kill zombies. This is disturbing for some players. This 7 Days to Die mod increases headshot damage.
modDescription:
The default headshot damage makes it difficult to kill [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/). This is disturbing for some players. This 7 Days to Die mod increases headshot damage.

**Changelog**

* Removed 25%/50%/75% options
* Added damage multipliers to compensate for HP increase due to difficulty adjustment.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/TSBX-7D/Modlets/tree/master/TSBX_Headshot_100)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8169-tsbx-collection/).

**Credits:** [TSBX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/tsbx/)
